gui

Class Explanation

  • Object
    • DefaultMutableTreeNode
      • Explanation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MutableTreeNode, TreeNode

    public class Explanation
extends DefaultMutableTreeNode
    This class extends DefaultMutableTreeNode to represent a tree hierarchy of explanations for the evaluation of the acceptance of a conditional. The GUI renders a tree control for this data structure.
    Author:
    Tobias Falke
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
